list.title: Data Analyst Intern
descriptionList: Conducted data analysis on transportation expenses, leading to a data-driven recommendation that resulted in a 15% reduction in transportation costs, saving the company $1.2M annually.
Implemented demand forecasting models and performed thorough data validation, leading to a 17% reduction in backorders to retail partners, improving product availability and customer satisfaction.
Led focus group sessions and performed business intelligence research to gain insights into customer preferences, enabling targeted marketing strategies that boosted sales by 15% in the NW region.
Collaborated with a team of developers to create interactive data visualizations, enhancing the decision-making process and promoting a data-driven culture within the organization.
Developed and presented a comprehensive internship project report, summarizing key findings and providing data-driven recommendations for future business optimization.

list.title: Software Engineering Intern
descriptionList: Identified opportunities for process automation within the transportation system, leading to a 15% reduction in transportation costs, resulting in $1.2M annual savings.
Contributed to the development and deployment of an improved demand forecasting algorithm, resulting in a 17% reduction in backorders to retail partners, streamlining inventory management.
Conducted extensive user research and gathered valuable insights through focus groups, which played a key role in boosting sales by 15% in the NW region.
Implemented new features and performed bug fixes for the company's flagship product, contributing to enhanced product stability and a more seamless user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to propose innovative solutions, resulting in improved efficiency and communication between departments.
